item.description:
From Kong to Kirby: Smash Bros' Masahiro Sakurai on mashing up 35 years of gaming history  The Guardian

Masahiro Sakurai is 48 years old, but looks almost ageless. In his face, you can see the prodigious teenager he once was. Sakurai was 19 when he directed his first game, Kirby’s Dream Land, at HAL Laboratory, a Tokyo developer that made a string of excellent games for Nintendo’s consoles in the 90s.
